name: Rashed Hacktoberfest
postCreateCommand: matlab-jupyter-app && timeout 22 bash -c 'until printf "" 2>>/dev/null >>/dev/tcp/$0/$1; do sleep 1; done' localhost 8888 && sensible-browser http://localhost:8888
timeout 22 bash -c 'until printf 123 2>>/dev/null >>/dev/tcp/$0/$1; do sleep 1; done' localhost 8888 && sensible-browser http://localhost:8888
